column1: 22372,Amazing Spider-Man Family (2008) #2,2,10559,189,"In a story by BPRD's JOHN ARCUDI and MARVEL APES' RAMON BACHS, track a crime across the years as we see a criminal's path covered from the Daily Bugle to the DB.  Then, in Mr. and Mrs. Spider-Man, Tom DeFalco and Ron Frenz show you how a father like Peter Parker deals with leaving his child for the day - remembering how his parents never returned when they last left him. Also, see more slices of Peter Parker's Brand New World and take a look at this month's AMAZING returning villain,  HAMMERHEAD!  Rated A ...$4.99",
